get.description: Read a page of contacts. Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: associations
parameters.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

post.description: Create a contact with the given properties and return a copy of the object, including the ID. Documentation and examples for creating standard contacts is provided.

post.summary: Archive a batch of contacts by ID
post.description: Archive a list of contacts given a collection of IDs. This method will return a `204 No Content` response on success regardless of the initial state of the object (e.g. active, already archived, non-existent).
Create a batch of contacts. This follows the same rules as creating an individual object.

post.summary: Read a batch of contacts by internal ID, or unique property values
post.description: Read a list of contacts given a collection of IDs. Use the `properties` request body property to control which properties are returned.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

post.description: Perform a partial upate on a batch of contacts. This follows the same rules as performing partial updates on an individual object.

post.summary: Filter, Sort, and Search CRM Objects
post.description: Filter, Sort, and Search CRM Objects

get.description: Read an Object identified by `{contactId}`. `{contactId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param.  Control what is returned via the `properties` query param.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.

parameters.name: associations
parameters.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object type

delete.description: Move an Object identified by `{contactId}` to the recycling bin.

patch.description: Perform a partial update of an Object identified by `{contactId}`. `{contactId}` refers to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property value as specified by the `idProperty` query param. Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will be ignored. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object type

get.summary: List associations of a contact by type

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

put.summary: Associate a contact with another object

delete.summary: Remove an association between two contacts

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

correlationId.description: A unique identifier for the request. Include this value with any error reports or support tickets

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

links.description: A map of link names to associated URIs containing documentation about the error or recommended remediation steps

example.message: Invalid input (details will vary based on the error)

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

in.description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.

code.description: The status code associated with the error detail

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

scopes.contacts: Read from and write to my Contacts
